name: Grieventide
description:
A quest awaits you in the land of Grieventide.

An endless night has fallen. Plants and trees wither and die. Can you survive the night, and might there be a way to reverse this cursed gloom?

Controls

WASD to move. Press the left mouse button to attack.

Bug Fixes
  • Inconsistent audio loudness
  • Attacking through walls
  • Reduce number of twigs
  • Exported with "shared array buffer" support to stop audio popping issues, this feature is experimental, so if the game doesn't work for you in the browser, it should work by downloading it.

The html5 web version has the bug fixes, you can play the bug-fix free version by downloading the Windows or Linux files.
